title: 7000 files are being scanned
body: usually its like 2k but its 7k and it keeps going up while I update to patch 6.14 on 33%.

replies.body:
NekroTronix, you may be experiencing a permissions issue blocking the patcher from scanning your files.  Go over our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to troubleshoot this.

I'm certainly happy to try and help if I can, Aqualious18!
hay man, i disabled My fire wall and made sure lol patcher can bypass it. Its just stuck at 33% : / .i also Run the game / launch as an admin. what do you recommend?
Bummer, but thanks for trying!  If the steps in the guide didn't work, please reach out to our[ tech team ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)who can help out further.

Am having the same issues, league is scanning over 1400 files and says the update failed. I repstarted my pc, still didn't work, i tried over 10 times to Retry. but so far nothing, my fire wall isn't blocking league /  lol patcher {{item:3070}}   stuck on 33%

It sounds like the patcher is scanning and repairing corrupted files, and can also happen if the patcher is closed while updating.  This scan can take some time depending on your computer, but it's important to remain patient until it's finished.  Restarting the patcher can result in the process starting over again.
Hey, sorry to bother you, but could you help with something outside of this issue
